title: Disconnects a pain in the  @#$%
body:
Only on telstra adsl2, but do other people find that they get random d/c whilst playing at times??
So annoying,.  Usually takes about 2mins to reconnect to the server.
During this time, my net still works fine for everything else.

Does anyone have any suggestions i might try to help fix this??

replies.body: Yeah, does your modem still say that you are on the net? because that's what my one does too. I called about 3 techs and then one dude actually checked the node and it was a fuck fest, so he spent like 2 hours fixing it. maybe it is that. but the thing is, telstra are one of the worst ISPs you can be with for customer satisfaction IMO
